page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: This block has Woodton telephone ex- change.73% of the houses have a tele- phone,for others there is a telephone box in each parish.The postal service is adequate,with 1 delivery & 2 col- lections daily.Bedingham Green's post box,dating from Edward 7 sits deep in a hedge!The 2 post offices have Giro- bank facilities so no-one is far from a bank.Woodton shop delivers papers & magazines,but Hedenham's come from Beccles & while its Sunday papers are supplied locally,the rest are not so. Of the parish magazines,Bedingham is served by the Hempnall Group of parishes,Hedenham shares with Ditch- ingham;they carry local & church news, also news of baptisms,weddings,etc. Norfolk C.C.'s mobile{library}visits monthly,bringing books which the librarian has learnt will be welcomed; people may also order other books.
